title: Chat and Friends problem
body: I download the game and since then i cant have access to my friends or chat can't click it and right from the message icon there is a yellow circle that goes off and on alongside with a questionmark

replies.body: Clubs are currently disabled, as the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) page mentions. If you're having issues connecting to all other aspects of PvP.net or chat at the moment, can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) to confirm?
